definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

pinyin: ren2 lei4 ji1 yin1 zu3 ji4 hua4

sentences.english: In genomic lingo, the sequences are said to "drift.
sentences.chinese: 用基因組術語，這個序列稱之爲“漂移”。

sentences.english: Does the Human Genome Project affect the moral standards of society?
sentences.chinese: 人類基因組計劃是否影響社會的道德標準呢？

sentences.english: Another important aspect of functional genomics is the research on human disease - related genes.
sentences.chinese: 功能基因組學另一個研究重點是人類疾病相關基因。

sentences.english: They then found the same virus lurking in the genome of the three-toed sloth.
sentences.chinese: 然後他們發現同樣的病毒也潛伏在三趾樹懶基因組裏。

sentences.english: That genal genome may lead to better treatment and control of diseaesthe disease.
sentences.chinese: 那些基因組能帶來比較好的治療和疾病的控制。

sentences.english: RNA-binding proteins, metabolism and a new function for the genome?
sentences.chinese: 結合蛋白，是代謝和基因組的新功能嗎？

sentences.english: He added that rice and maize genomes that were decoded in the past were much smaller.
sentences.chinese: 他補充道，以往解碼的水稻與玉米基因組都要小的多。

sentences.english: PCR and APX activity detection showed that transgenic plants were obtained.
sentences.chinese: 檢測證明目的基因已經整合到菸草基因組中。

sentences.english: It’s his job to build the genome and protein infrastructure for mirror life.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作是爲鏡像生命構築基因組和蛋白基本結構。

sentences.english: Surely you've heard about the Aphid Genome Project.
sentences.chinese: 你一定聽說過的蚜蟲基因組計劃。

sentences.english: This represents the first report of a draft V. volvacea genomic sequence.
sentences.chinese: 這是在國際上首次報道的草菇基因組框架圖。

sentences.english: The bacterial artificial chromosome (BAG) library is the basic tool for the genome research.
sentences.chinese: 基因組文庫是進行基因組研究的基礎工作之一。

sentences.english: The bacterial artificial chromosome (BAG) library is the basic tool for the genome research.
sentences.chinese: 基因組文庫是進行基因組研究的基礎工作之一。

sentences.english: The sequencing of the B. hypnoides complete chloroplast genome.
sentences.chinese: ⑵蘚羽藻葉綠體基因組全序列的測定。

sentences.english: Recent research progress of baculovirus genomics was introduced as well.
sentences.chinese: 同時也介紹了桿狀病毒基因組研究的新結果。

sentences.english: METHODS: The research was devided into 2 groups: allogene group and isogenenic group.
sentences.chinese: 方法研究分爲2組，即異基因組和同基因組。
